title: Hurricane Irma: If There Was Such A Thing As A Category 6 Hurricane, This Would Be It
text: This Was A Major Red Flag In 2008, And Now It Is Happening Again! November 13, 2025 by Michael The alarms are getting even louder each week.  It has become exceedingly clear that the U.S. economy has entered a crisis that is similar to what we experienced in 2008 and 2009, and a lot of people are really starting to freak out.  For those that cannot see the stunning parallels between the Great Recession and what we are going through now, I don’t know what to say to them.  There are a lot of people out there that simply choose to believe whatever they want to believe no matter what the evidence indicates.  In this case, all of the evidence is pointing in a single direction. (Read More...)
